attributes.additional_details: When we were little, we remember our Mum taking us to the market, which was based behind Barclays Bank then, where we would walk around for hours. Mum would visit each stall at least twice, in case she missed a bargain the first time round. There were so many stalls back then. Why are we telling you all this, we hear you ask. Well, local trader Janet Sewell wrote to us saying “Crawley Council has shut the Wednesday market in the Town Square, we have been given a weeks notice

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local council (perhaps contact your MP?) not the Government.
